title: Just discovered this blog
body: Wow! Glad to have found a place where I can post updates about my learnings in the tech field. Very interesting. Anyone else here like mySQL

title: Thoughts on JavaScript
body: I prefer JavaScript over most programming languages. It is, after all, the backbone of what we see in browsers.

title: How to successfully be a tech geek
body: Make sure you surround yourself with computer monitors. Carry a lot of books about front-end development. Make friends with other people in the field.
